name: Scottish Salmon Producers' Organisation
membership:
Member of Federation of European Aquaculture Producers (FEAP)
Member of International Salmon Farmers Association (ISFA)
goal: Set up in 2006 as an industry producers' organisation for the Scottish salmon farming industry, the SSPO encompasses >90% of the tonnage of Scottish farmed salmon production. All members participate in and adhere to the industry's code of good practice. The organisation plays a central role in representing the industry on in the political, regulatory, media and technical arenas in Scotland, the UK, EU and Internationally.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Blue Growth
European Maritime and Fisheries Fund (EMFF)
Horizon 2020 research
Common Organisation of the Markets (CMO)
Common Fisheries Policy (CFP)
